script
start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 devicemanagement Test not run


Narrative

As a security officer I want the platform to be able to update public keys for each device

Happy flow:


Scenario: successfully update key for existing device

scenario success input values device key
given an update key request with @device and @key
and the update key request refers to an existing device @device
and the update key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the update key request is received on OSGP
then the device's key should be updated to @key
and an update key response should be returned

success input values
device key
DVC-01 KEY1
scenario success input values device key
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an update key request with DVC-01 and KEY1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to an existing device DVC-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the update key request is received on OSGP
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device's key should be updated to KEY1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist an update key response should be returned

Alternative flow:


Scenario: successfully update key for non-existing device

scenario alternative input values device key
given an update key request with @device and @key
and the update key request refers to a non-existing device @device
and the update key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the update key request is received on OSGP
then a device should be created with @device and @key
and an update key response should be returned

alternative input values
device key
DVC-02 KEY2
scenario alternative input values device key
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an update key request with DVC-02 and KEY2
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to a non-existing device DVC-02
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the update key request is received on OSGP
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist a device should be created with DVC-02 and KEY2
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist an update key response should be returned

Exception flows:


Scenario: invalid base64 public key

scenario error input values device key
given an update key request with @device and @key
and the update key request refers to an existing device @device
and the update key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the update key request is received on OSGP
then the device @device should not be updated with the invalid key @key
and the update key request should return an error message

error input values
device key
DVC-03
scenario error input values device key
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an update key request with DVC-03 and
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to an existing device DVC-03
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the update key request is received on OSGP
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device DVC-03 should not be updated with the invalid key
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request should return an error message
DVC-04 KEY-???
scenario error input values device key
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an update key request with DVC-04 and KEY-???
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to an existing device DVC-04
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the update key request is received on OSGP
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device DVC-04 should not be updated with the invalid key KEY-???
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the update key request should return an error message
